@template access

{{html:
<div class="account-container stacked upMargin" ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="SessionController">
    <div class="content clearfix padding"  ng-controller="SignUpController">
        <div class="login-symbol signUpForm">
        <h1>Sign Up</h1>

        <div class="login-fields">
        <!-- remove autocomplete="off" when password fields back to make sure browser save passwords -->
            <form name="reg" ng-submit="signUp()" autocomplete="off"> <!-- name should be "reg" for some browsers to recognize it as a registration form -->
                <div class="alert alert-error ng-hide" ng-show="!isPasswordConfirmed">The passwords do not match.</div>
                <div class="alert alert-error ng-hide" ng-show="signUpError">{[signUpError]}</div>

                <div class="field">
                  <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="username">Username:</label>
                    <div class="inputWrap">
                      <input style="background-color: transparent !important; background-attachment: none !important; background-image: none !important; position: relative; font-size: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 20px;" class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="text" id="username" name="username" value=""  ng-model="user.username" />
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="field">
                  <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="name">Name:</label>
                    <div class="inputWrap">
                      <input style="background-color: transparent !important; background-attachment: none !important; background-image: none !important; position: relative; font-size: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 20px;" class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="text" id="name" name="name" value=""  ng-model="user.name" />
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="field">
                  <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="company">Company:</label>
                    <div class="inputWrap">
                      <input style="background-color: transparent !important; background-attachment: none !important; background-image: none !important; position: relative; font-size: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 20px;" class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="text" id="company" name="company" value=""  ng-model="user.company" />
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="field">
                  <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="companyurl">Company URL:</label>
                    <div class="inputWrap">
                      <input style="background-color: transparent !important; background-attachment: none !important; background-image: none !important; position: relative; font-size: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 20px;" class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="text" id="companyurl" name="companyurl" value=""  ng-model="user.companyurl" />
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="field">
                  <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="email">E-mail address:</label>
                    <div class="input-prepend">
                    <div class="inputWrap">
                    	<input style="background-color: transparent !important; background-attachment: none !important; background-image: none !important; position: relative; font-size: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 20px;" class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="text" id="email" value=""  ng-model="email" />
                        <input style="display: none;" type="text" id="email" value=""  ng-model="user.email" />
                    </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="field" style="display: none;">
                  <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="password">Password:</label>
                    <div class="input-prepend">
  		      <div class="inputWrap">
                        <input class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="password" id="password_field" name="" value=""  ng-model="user.password"/>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="field" style="display: none;">
                <div class="loginField">
                    <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2" for="password">Password Confirmation:</label>
                    <div class="input-prepend">
  						<div class="inputWrap">
                      <input class="inputLogin ng-pristine ng-valid" type="password" id="password_field_confirmation" name="password_confirmation" value="" 
                        	ng-model="passwordConfirmation" ng-blur="validatePasswordConfirmation()"/>
                          </div>
                   	</div>
                </div>
                </div>
                <div id="flags-container" class="field mtl center">
                  <label class="label-location mbm txt-center display-block row">Preferred CloudSpace Location</label>
                  <ul class="flags-list mtl mll row inline-block">
                      <li class="mrl" ng-class="{ 'selected': selectedLocation == 3 }" ng-click="itemClicked(3)">
                          <a href="" ng-model="preferredDataLocation" class="canada"></a>
                          <span class="mts display-block cursor-default">Canada</span>
                      </li>
                      <li class="mrm" ng-class="{ 'selected': selectedLocation == 2 }" ng-click="itemClicked(2)">
                          <a href="" ng-model="preferredDataLocation" class="united states"></a>
                          <span class="mts display-block cursor-default">United States</span>
                      </li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
            <a id="openTerms" ng-click="openTerms()">You need to accept the General Terms & Conditions to proceed</a>
            <script type="text/ng-template" id="termsDialog.html">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h2>General Terms & Conditions</h2>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                  <div id="terms" style="width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: auto; overflow-x: hidden; -ms-overflow-x: hidden;">
}}
{{include:Disclaimer}}
{{html:
                  </div>
                  <div class="mtl">
                    <input id="accept-terms" type="checkbox" style="float: left; margin-right: 5px;" onClick="acceptTermsChanged(this);">
                    <label for="accept-terms" style="font-style: italic; font-size: 12px;">I have read and understood the above General Terms and Conditions</label>
                </div>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary ok" ng-click="cancel()">Accept</button>
                </div>
            </script>
            </div>
              <input class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block primaryMine"  type="submit" ng-disabled="!canSignUp" value="Sign Up" />

              <div class="center txt-right mtm mTxt">
          <span class="mrs">Already a member?</span>
          <a href="/$$space/login" class="btn btn-default btn-lg btn-block defaultMine">Login</a>
        </div>
            
        </form>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
        

}}
